column3: Love the game, would love to see a high score list, were you can go see how you did compared to others. I cracked a new personal record by getting a 8192 square and finished on a high score just short of 150,000.
this game was fun at start but when you get into it you fimd out all sorts of mind numbing bugs. not worth spending your precious time on it.

Very nice execution. The menu fade animation is a bit frustrating though, and I think the 'About' section can be merged so you don't have an unnecessary level of settings. The original color scheme is a bit tacky, but very easy to configure. Gameplay is wonderful and the sound effect makes it even m...Full ReviewVery nice execution. The menu fade animation is a bit frustrating though, and I think the 'About' section can be merged so you don't have an unnecessary level of settings. The original color scheme is a bit tacky, but very easy to configure. Gameplay is wonderful and the sound effect makes it even more addictive. Nice job :)

Good game. I like the game really well, only I think there should be lives so when you lose, you can get like three tiles taken away and you can continue, just that you can only do that twice in a round. If you do that twice, then you have to start all over and your progress will be lost. But it's a good game....Full ReviewI like the game really well, only I think there should be lives so when you lose, you can get like three tiles taken away and you can continue, just that you can only do that twice in a round. If you do that twice, then you have to start all over and your progress will be lost. But it's a good game. Really challenging. Well done.
Really nice Like it a lot. Only wish I could use undo even after game over. (PS. My previous review mentioning bad performance was caused by another app.)
Very addictive First played this on my daughters app Tom car...was mini game....now I'm hooked. Find myself playing this over and over :)
Very addictive game. Husband gets upset I'm on do long. lol

Great There are loads of other 2048 on GP and this one is the best because it has a great interface distinguishing colors but it will have 4 stars until they fix the menu witch is dorky still best 2048 on GP
Flashing ads The flashing ads on the bottom of this game drove me mad. Don't usually mind ads, I get why we have them. Had to uninstall it for these horrendous ads alone.
Shuts down w/o warning This app simply stops working and closes without warning. There's got to be a bug or two somewhere.
So relaxing This game is so relaxing my parents just had a big fight and I was crying so hard and this game just called me down
Awesome I enjoyed it very well... But there is a mistake.. There is no back step option in this... If this will be also there... Then it will be✌✌✌
I first started playing this game on the tablet when I was locked up. It's addictive
Keeps me thinking Very challenging and makes me think a bit. Excellent app/game to play for a spare few minutes .
Great version of 2048! It has the option of sound effects, looks beautiful with nice smooth animations, good gameplay and pace. What is not to like? (Except for ads maybe but thats available)
Fun, few hiccups Freezes up and have to reset, but only once and a while.
Addicting!!!! Love it. Never freezes.. smooth ... customizable... only suggestion is to add the option to use own images for background (colors). Thnx for this fun app!
I love 2048 games but this one is extra special because you can customize the colors on it. I play this game all the time.

Worst Some modifications should be done, bcause the way tiles move is really very bad if u want to move a particular column or row all other tiles which don't belong to that column also move ! Just irritating..!!
Nice puzzle Nice piece to keep me relax any time am stressed out. You can improve on the animation.
Some silly banner ads at the bottom to ignore but otherwise very responsive and playable with no disruptive full screen ads.
Great game!! One of my stress relief game ever
